ARABIC: وَيُحِقُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْحَقَّ بِكَلِمَٰتِهِۦ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah confirms the Truth by His words, even though the evildoers hate it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: God vindicates the truth by His commands, however the sinners may dislike it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah vindicates the truth by His commands, howsoever much the guilty might detest that.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God will make the Truth stand supreme by His words, even though the wicked people dislike it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And Allah will prove the truth by His Words, even if the guilty get annoyed.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Allah will establish and make apparent the truth by His Words, however much the criminals may hate (it)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Allah will show the truth to be the truth by His words, though the guilty may be averse (to it).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: God verifies the truth by His words, though sinners be averse.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Allah will vindicate the Truth by His words, however much the guilty be averse.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God establishes the truth by His words, however much the sinners may dislike it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Allah justifieth the truth according to His words, even though the culprits may detest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Allah will confirm the truth with His words, though the guilty should be averse.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And Allah by His words doth prove and establish His truth, however much the sinners may hate it!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And Allah will establish and make apparent the truth by His Words, however much the Mujrimun (criminals, disbelievers, polytheists, sinners, etc.) may hate it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah verifies the truth by His Words, even though the sinners hate it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “And God upholds the truth with His words, even though the sinners detest it.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Allah will establish the truth by His words, even if the criminals dislike it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [10:82] And God will vindicate, He will establish and make prevail, the Truth by His words, by His promises, however much the sinners be averse’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Allah will vindicate) Allah will manifest for His religion (the Truth by His words) vindication, (however much the guilty be averse) even though the idolaters dislike this.
